document.full_text: bahrain's king has ordered a state of emergency to be lifted from june 1, after imposing it following weeks of shi'ite-led street protests in the gulf arab kingdom, the state news agency said sunday.
document.title: bahrain to lift state of emergency from june 1
lines_and_colors: bahrain's king has ordered a state of emergency to be lifted from june 1, after imposing it following weeks of shi'ite-led street protests in the gulf arab kingdom, the state news agency said sunday.
